languages.text: "Не сочтите за оскорбление, Ваша Светлость, но в данный момент на "Обете Императора" я самый старший по званию. А Лорд-капитан..." {n}Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф откашливается, подбирая слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не сочтите за оскорбление, Ваша Светлость, но в данный момент на "Обете Императорая" я самый старший по званию. А Лорд-капитан..." {n}Эрбрегхт ап Даэфф откашливается, подбирая слова.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am the most senior officer aboard the Emperor's Vow at the moment. As for the Lord Captain..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Sans vouloir vous offenser, Votre Seigneurie, je me trouve être l'officier le plus haut gradé à bord du Serment de l'Empereur. Quant au seigneur-capitaine... » {n}Erbreght ap Daeff s'éclaircit la gorge tandis qu'il cherche ses mots.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am the most senior officer aboard the Emperor's Vow at the moment. As for the Lord Captain..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Sans vouloir vous offenser, Votre Seigneurie, je me trouve être l'officier le plus haut gradé à bord du Serment de l'Empereur. Quant au seigneur-capitaine... » {n}Erbreght ap Daeff s'éclaircit la gorge tandis qu'il cherche ses mots.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我无意冒犯您，大人，但我目前是帝皇誓约号上级别最高的军官。至于舰长大人……”{n}埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫清了清嗓子，寻找着合适的词语。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am the most senior officer aboard the Emperor's Vow at the moment. As for the Lord Captain..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我无意冒犯您，大人，但我目前是帝皇誓约号上级别最高的军官。至于舰长大人……”{n}埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫清了清嗓子，寻找着合适的词语。{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euch nicht beleidigen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch ich bin im Augenblick der ranghöchste Offizier an Bord der Eid des Imperators. Und was den Lord Captain angeht", {n}Erbreght ap Daeff räuspert sich, während er nach den richtigen Worten sucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am the most senior officer aboard the Emperor's Vow at the moment. As for the Lord Captain..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte Euch nicht beleidigen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch ich bin im Augenblick der ranghöchste Offizier an Bord der Eid des Imperators. Und was den Lord Captain angeht"{n}, {n}Erbreght ap Daeff räuspert sich, während er nach den richtigen Worten sucht.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «No quisiera ofenderl{mf|o|a}, {mf|milord|milady}, pero soy el oficial de mayor categoría que hay a bordo del Voto del Emperador ahora mismo. En cuanto al Lord Capitán...». {n}Erbreght ap Daeff carraspea, buscando las palabras correctas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am the most senior officer aboard the Emperor's Vow at the moment. As for the Lord Captain..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No quisiera ofenderl{mf|o|a}, {mf|milord|milady}, pero soy el oficial de mayor categoría que hay a bordo del Voto del Emperador ahora mismo. En cuanto al Lord Capitán...». {n}Erbreght ap Daeff carraspea, buscando las palabras correctas.{/n}
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「気を悪くしないでほしい、陛下、だが私は現時点で『皇帝の誓い』号の最上級士官だ。ロード・キャプテンの場合…」{n}エルブレート・アプ・ダエフは咳払いし、言葉を探した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am the most senior officer aboard the Emperor's Vow at the moment. As for the Lord Captain..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizi rencide etmek istemem ama şu anda İmparator'un Andı'ndaki en kıdemli subay benim. Lord Kaptan'a gelince..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff, boğazını temizleyip doğru sözcükleri arıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not wish to offend, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am the most senior officer aboard the Emperor's Vow at the moment. As for the Lord Captain..." {n}Erbreght ap Daeff clears his throat, looking for the right words.{/n}
